text:
Lawyers in the Puducherry Bar Association on Monday boycotted court proceedings demanding to review the suspension of a few advocates.

Tamil Nadu and Puducherry Advocates Federation had called for the boycott of courts.

The lawyers also urged that the Advocate Welfare Fund to be enhanced to Rs.10 lakh and the monthly stipend of Rs.3000 to young lawyers. - Special Correspondent
title: Lawyers boycott court proceedings
